root.str:
Focus your strength into a precise sword thrust.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Deals <font color='#00aaef'>904%</font> damage. Grants knockback immunity.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>

Spread wings of light to create a curtain of divine energy. Hold down the skill key to project a Guardian Shield in front of you.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font> Deals <font color='#00aaef'>732%</font> damage. Reduces incoming damage by <font color='#00aaef'>80%</font>. Increases perfect guard by <font color='#00aaef'>24%</font>. Able to move while this is active. Grants knockback immunity. 
Movement speed increases by 20%

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Guardian Shield deals <font color='#00aaef'>1040%</font> damage and pierces targets <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> times.

Channel divine fury through your sword, gaining offensive power at the expense of defense.

Increases physical and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>29%</font>, but decreases defense by <font color='#00aaef'>20%</font>. Disables all shield skills except for Shield Charge.

Dash forward with your shield out, rushing forward <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> m per dash. End this move by striking down with your sword, creating a shockwave.
<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font> Each dash deals <font color='#00aaef'>138%</font> damage. The shockwave deals <font color='#00aaef'>458%</font> damage.
This skill changes during Defensive Tactics. Grants knockback immunity.

Dash forward with your shield out, rushing forward <font color='#00aaef'>1.5</font> m per dash. After the final dash, summon a holy sword.
<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font> Each dash deals <font color='#00aaef'>338%</font> damage and creates a shockwave that deals <font color='#00aaef'>658%</font> damage.
The final shockwave deals <font color='#00aaef'>520%</font> damage and summons a holy sword.
This skill changes during Defensive Tactics. Grants knockback immunity.
<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font> The holy sword deals <font color='#00aaef'>2113%</font> holy damage.

Change up your tactics based on your current health.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
When max health is at least <font color='#00aaef'>70%</font>, activates Offensive Tactics.

When max health is <font color='#00aaef'>30%</font> or less, activates Defensive Tactics.

Permanently increases strength by <font color='#00aaef'>40</font>.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Offensive Tactics increases all damage by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font>.
Defensive Tactics increases physical and magic defense by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font>.
